item.title: Leaked Wikis, #Cablegate, and Little Else
item.description: There has been tons of interesting commentary and analysis surrounding cablegate. I have been interested and have read quite a few of the original cables, especially the ones about Somalia as well as much of the journalistic coverage of the story and the analysis (punditry) side of the story. The main thing I was struck upon reading the entirety of this article is that this entire deal is quite anticlimatic.
